mapper.select: SELECT B.nm, B.product_code, C.color, C.hdd, C.ssd, C.price, D.quantity, C.img FROM t_order A INNER JOIN t_order_product D ON A.iorder = D.iorder INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON D.idetail = C.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master B ON C.iproduct = B.iproduct WHERE A.iorder = #{iorder}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iorder) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_order WHERE rdt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND date_add(#{toDate}, interval +1 day) AND iuser = #{iuser}
